resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104601</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104601</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200298</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Hole in the Sky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Bohrung im Himmel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un trou dans le ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um furo no céu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un foro nel cielo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια τρύπα στον ουρανό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un agujero en el cielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This video segment adapted from Interactive NOVA profiles two scientists who were surprised in 1984 to discover a hole in our atmosphere's ozone layer as big as the United States.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses videosegment paßte von den interaktiven 
NOVA-Profilen zwei Wissenschaftler an, die 1984 überrascht waren, 
eine Bohrung in der Ozon-Schicht unserer Atmosphäre zu entdecken, die
so groß ist wie die Vereinigten Staaten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce segment visuel a adapté des profils interactifs
de NOVA deux scientifiques qui étaient étonnés en 1984 de 
découvrir un trou dans la couche de l'ozone de la notre atmosphère 
aussi grande que les Etats-Unis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este segmento video adaptou dos perfis interativos 
do NOVA dois cientistas que foram surpreendidos em 1984 descobrir um 
furo na camada de ozônio da nossa atmosfera tão grande quanto os 
estados unidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo video segmento ha adattato dai profili 
interattivi del NOVA due scienziati che sono stati sorpresi in 1984 
scoprire un foro nello strato di ozono del nostro atmosfera grande 
come unito Dichiara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το τηλεοπτικό τμήμα μνήμης που προσαρμόζεται 
από τα διαλογικά σχεδιαγράμματα NOVA δύο επιστήμονες που 
εξεπλάγησαν το 1984 να ανακαλύψουν τρύπα στο στρώμα όζοντος 
της ατμόσφαιράς μας τόσο μεγάλο όσο οι Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este segmento video adaptó de perfiles 
interactivos de la NOVA a dos científicos que fueron sorprendidos en 
1984 descubrir un agujero en la capa de ozono de nuestra atmósfera 
tan grande como los Estados Unidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200298</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104601</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/a-hole-in-the-sky</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
